languages.text: "За годы моего служения я пришел к выводу, что главная проблема Человечества в этой войне — неравные силы. Нам противостоят не расы и не народы, нам противостоят немыслимые чудовища. И нам давно пора обзавестись своими. Мое Ярмо поработит эту тварь и сделает цепным стражем на службе Императору".

"Over my years of service, I have come to realise that the main problem that Humanity faces in this war is the imbalance in power. Our opponents are not races or nations, but incomprehensible monsters. And it is high time we acquired one of our own. My Yoke will bind this creature and make it a chained guard serving the Emperor."
languages.original_text: "За годы моего служения я пришел к выводу, что главная проблема Человечества в этой войне — неравные силы. Нам противостоят не расы и не народы, нам противостоят немыслимые чудовища. И нам давно пора обзавестись своими. Мое Ярмо поработит эту тварь и сделает цепным стражем на службе Императору".

traits.locale_text: "Over my years of service, I had come to realise that the main problem that the Humanity faces in this war is the imbalance in power. We are opposed neither by races nor by nations — but by the incomprehensible monsters. And it is high time for us to get one of our own. My Yoke will enslave the monster and make it a chained guard serving the Emperor."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Au cours de ma carrière, j'ai réalisé que le plus gros problème de l'humanité dans cette guerre est le déséquilibre des forces. Nos adversaires ne sont ni des races ni des nations, mais des monstres incompréhensibles et il est grand temps que nous contrôlions le nôtre. Mon Joug asservira cette créature et en fera un garde docile au service de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "Over my years of service, I have come to realise that the main problem that Humanity faces in this war is the imbalance in power. Our opponents are not races or nations, but incomprehensible monsters. And it is high time we acquired one of our own. My Yoke will bind this creature and make it a chained guard serving the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: « Au cours de ma carrière, j'ai réalisé que le plus gros problème de l'humanité dans cette guerre est le déséquilibre des forces. Nous n'affrontons ni des races ni des nations, mais des monstres incompréhensibles et il est grand temps que nous contrôlions le nôtre. Mon Joug asservira le monstre et en fera un garde docile au service de l'Empereur. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «En mis años de servicio, he llegado a la conclusión de que el problema más grave al que se enfrenta la Humanidad en esta guerra es la diferencia de poder. Nuestros enemigos no son razas ni naciones, sino monstruos incomprensibles. Ya es hora de que nos hagamos con uno de ellos. Mi Yugo esclavizará a esta criatura y la convertirá en un guardián encadenado al servicio del Emperador».
languages.original_text: "Over my years of service, I have come to realise that the main problem that Humanity faces in this war is the imbalance in power. Our opponents are not races or nations, but incomprehensible monsters. And it is high time we acquired one of our own. My Yoke will bind this creature and make it a chained guard serving the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: «Durante mis años de servicio, he llegado a entender que el principal problema de la Humanidad en esta guerra es el desequilibrio de poder. No nos enfrentamos a otras razas ni naciones, sino a monstruos incomprensibles, y ya es hora de que nos hagamos con uno propio. Mi Yugo esclavizará al monstruo y lo convertirá en un guardián encadenado al servicio del Emperador».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “侍奉帝国的这些年来，我逐渐意识到——在这场战争中，人类面对的最大的问题，就是力量的不平衡。我们的敌人既不是哪个特定的种族，也不是哪个特定的国家，而是这些无法理解的怪物。正因如此，我们也要有我们自己的怪物。我的圣枷会牢牢束缚住这个怪物，让它成为帝皇的忠诚守卫。”
languages.original_text: "Over my years of service, I have come to realise that the main problem that Humanity faces in this war is the imbalance in power. Our opponents are not races or nations, but incomprehensible monsters. And it is high time we acquired one of our own. My Yoke will bind this creature and make it a chained guard serving the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: “侍奉帝国的这些年来，我逐渐意识到——在这场战争中，人类面对的最大的问题，就是力量的不平衡。我们的敌人既不是哪个特定的种族，也不是哪个特定的国家，而是这些无法理解的怪物。正因如此，我们也要有我们自己的怪物。我的圣枷会牢牢束缚住这个怪物，让它成为帝皇的忠诚守卫。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "In meinen Jahren des Dienstes habe ich erkannt, dass die Menschheit in diesem Krieg vor allem ein Problem hat: das Ungleichgewicht der Macht. Unsere Gegner sind keine Völker oder Nationen, sind unverständliche Monster. Und es wird höchste Zeit, dass wir uns ein eigenes zulegen. Mein Joch wird diese Kreatur binden, sie an die Kette legen, auf dass sie dem Imperator als Wache dienen kann."
languages.original_text: "Over my years of service, I have come to realise that the main problem that Humanity faces in this war is the imbalance in power. Our opponents are not races or nations, but incomprehensible monsters. And it is high time we acquired one of our own. My Yoke will bind this creature and make it a chained guard serving the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "In meinen Jahren des Dienstes habe ich erkannt, dass die Menschheit in diesem Krieg vor allem ein Problem hat: das Ungleichgewicht der Macht. Unsere Gegner sind keine Spezies, keine Nationen, sondern die unverständlichen Monster. Und es wird höchste Zeit, dass wir uns selbst ein solches zulegen. Mein Joch wird das Monster versklaven und zu einem Wächter in Ketten machen, der dem Imperator dient."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「この戦争で人類が直面している主な問題は、力の不均衡だ。我々が敵対しているのは、種族でも国家でもなく、不可解な怪物たちなのだ。そして今こそ、我々もその力を手にするときがきたのだ。私のヨークは怪物を拘束し、皇帝に仕える鎖につながれた衛兵にするのだ」
languages.original_text: "Over my years of service, I have come to realise that the main problem that Humanity faces in this war is the imbalance in power. Our opponents are not races or nations, but incomprehensible monsters. And it is high time we acquired one of our own. My Yoke will bind this creature and make it a chained guard serving the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 「この戦争で人類が直面している主な問題は、力の不均衡だ。我々が敵対しているのは、種族でも国家でもなく、不可解な怪物たちなのだ。そして今こそ、我々も力そのものを手にするときがきたのだ。私のヨークは怪物を隷属させ、皇帝に仕える鎖につながれた衛兵にするのだ」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Bunca yıl hizmet ettikten sonra İnsanlığın bu savaşta karşılaştığı asıl problemin güç dengesizliği olduğunu fark ettim. Rakiplerimiz ırk veya uluslar değil, anlaşılmaz canavarlar. Bizim de kendimize bir canavar edinmemizin vakti geldi. Boyunduruk, bu yaratığı bağlayacak ve İmparator'a hizmet eden zincirli bir muhafız hâline getirecek."
languages.original_text: "Over my years of service, I have come to realise that the main problem that Humanity faces in this war is the imbalance in power. Our opponents are not races or nations, but incomprehensible monsters. And it is high time we acquired one of our own. My Yoke will bind this creature and make it a chained guard serving the Emperor."
